gameDetails.name: Age of Steam Expansion: Jamaica / Puerto Rico
gameDetails.description:
This new set of expansion maps is fully compatible with Age of Steam and Steam.

Jamaica is a two player map that takes place on the small Caribbean island of the same name
Puerto Rico is a single player map with varying levels of difficulty that can be played in 30 minutes or less.

Original edition maps are not mounted.  They are printed on card stock and cut into 2 pieces.
Age of Steam Deluxe versions are mounted boards.
